introduction.short: Hello, I am Xuan Hui Khiu, a 5th year dental student graduating in December 2023. And I am currently seeking for a graduate dentist position, and this portfolio will help you to know me better!
introduction.profile: Passionate final-year dental student who will be graduating in December 2023 seeking a recent graduate dentist position that allows me to continue providing patients with a comfortable and great experience. I am excited to find opportunities to apply my special interest in improving patients' oral health and building up their confidence levels. I strongly value self-reflection, empathy towards patients, and quality care. I am looking for a workplace that can offer a nurturing environment, providing mentorship and support as I continue to maximize my skillset.

experiences.title: Shadowing Experience
responsibilities: Engaged in shadowing opportunity at Dr. Khoo's Dental Clinic in my hometown prior to enrolling in the School of Dentistry.
Gained firsthand exposure to a professional dental environment, observing various dental procedures and patient interactions.
Developing initial insights into the dental field, sparking my passion for dentistry and confirming my pursuit of a career in oral healthcare.

experiences.title: Dental Assistant
responsibilities: Assisted dentists in performing a range of treatments.
Collaborated with colleagues in a team-based environment to ensure optimal patient care and smooth clinic operations.
Enhanced patient communication skills through interactions and learning opportunities with experienced dentists, contributing to improved patient experiences and satisfaction.
Gained exposure to billing processes and clinic management aspects, expanding knowledge of administrative functions within a dental practice.

experiences.title: Placement
responsibilities: Familiar with ISOH patient management software
Completed a range of simple and complex treatments in rural Queensland (2 hours inland from Brisbane)

experiences.title: Placement
responsibilities: Experience with ISOH patient management software
Completed treatment from simple to complex (RCT, surgical extractions, crowns, dentures, restorations, splints fabrication)

education.title: Bachelor of Dental Science (Honours)
responsibilities: Proficient in a range of dental procedures from simple to complex including root canal treatment, extractions, crown placement, denture fitting, restoration and treatment of periodontal and pediatric cases.
Familiar with ISOH patient management software to improve patient record keeping and management efficiency.
Proficient in multiple languages ​​​​and able to communicate effectively with diverse patient populations.
Recipient of the 2020 Dean's Award for Academic Excellence, demonstrating a strong commitment to learning and achievement.

photos.title: Placement
photos.intro: These are the picture I have when I was in placement in Toowoomba Oral Health Clinic in Jan 2023, and I have meet a group of very friendly people there and I have a very great time!
